name: Speed Dates Part I
description:
Important note, language packs will come with the update.

SPEED DATES: PART I

Our main character Murat attends the Speed Date event and has only a few minutes to get to know the women and make him love himself. Try to impress the girls in this adventure where you can experience today's male-female relationships in the most realistic way.



FEATURES
• A romantic-comedy FMV game filmed with 19 real actors in 4K.
• 54 different paths and 36 different endings.


• Over 500 scenes.
• High replayability with an estimated 8 hours of gameplay.
